Text: departureLiz Hope you are well I just finished my MBA at Chicago and am leaving MDCK shortly to look for something else to do either in Austin Houston back up on the East Coast or maybe in Europe probably on the business side or some law business combinationShould you hear of anything or have any good ideas I would appreciate hearing about them Thanks RP

DepartureALL I have just completed my MBA at the University of Chicago and am leaving the law firm of Mayor Day Caldwell Keeton shortly My new contact information as of Thursday February is as follows Roliff Purrington Congress Avenue Suite Austin Texas office fax home mobile Email on the road Email Please put both in your system I look forward to hearing from you Regards Roliff Purrington
